
xxx11xxx111xx11x111xxx1111xxx1 2^15
4 perechi de 3 luate cate 1
00011xxx111xx11x111xxx1111xxx1 2^12
xxx11000111xx11x111xxx1111xxx1 
xxx11xxx111xx11x1110001111xxx1 
xxx11xxx111xx11x111xxx11110001
4 perechi de 3 luate cate 2
00011000111xx11x111xxx1111xxx1 2^9
00011xxx111xx11x1110001111xxx1
00011xxx111xx11x111xxx11110001
xxx11000111xx11x1110001111xxx1
xxx11000111xx11x111xxx11110001
xxx11xxx111xx11x11100011110001
4 perechi de 3 luate cate 3
00011000111xx11x1110001111xxx1
00011000111xx11x111xxx11110001 2^6
xxx11000111xx11x11100011110001
00011xxx111xx11x11100011110001
4 perechi de 4 luate cate 4
00011000111xx11x11100011110001 2^3

2^15 - 4*2^12 + 6*2^9 - 4*2^6 + 2^3
